display_long_description:
Embark on an epic bird hunting adventure in the immersive world of Bird Hunter VR. Armed with a variety of powerful guns, your mission is to take down as many birds as possible before they escape.
Experience the thrill of hunting in virtual reality as you dodge flying projectiles and unleash devastating firepower. Face off against diverse bird species, each with unique flight patterns and behaviors. Explore beautifully rendered landscape as you hunt for birds in stunning virtual environments.
Key Features:
•	Optimized for Meta Quest: Enjoy the game's full potential on your Meta Quest device, with stunning visuals and smooth performance.
•	Extensive Arsenal: Choose from a wide range of guns, including shotguns, rifles, and even explosive weapons, each with its own unique characteristics and firing mechanics.
•	Dynamic Challenges: Face increasingly challenging waves of birds as you progress through the game. Each wave will introduce new bird species with different flight patterns and behaviors, keeping you on your toes.
•	Immersive Environments: Explore a variety of beautifully rendered landscapes, featuring forest and lake. Experience the thrill of hunting in immersive environment.
Download now and experience the ultimate VR bird hunting adventure on your Meta Quest!
